actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 to exclude any coal mine in which every miner who works in such mine is either complete or partial owner or member of the immediate family of such owner from coverage under titles I, II, and III of the act.

summary.text: Excludes from coverage under Title I (Health and Safety Standards), Title II (Interim Mandatory Health Standards), and Title III (Interim Mandatory Safety Standards for Underground Coal Mines) of the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act, any coal mine which is owned by an individual, a partnership, an association, a firm, or other organization where every miner who works in such mine has either complete or partial ownership of the coal mine or is a parent, spouse, or other member of the immediate family of such owner.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 to exclude any coal mine in which every miner who works in such mine is either complete or partial owner or member of the immediate family of such owner from coverage under titles I, II, and III of the act.
